text: (Ne tumala tukikola) mazima tunaaba tugunjizza ku Katonda e bigambo e byobulimba singa tudda mu ddiini ya mmwe, oluvanyuma lwa Katonda okugituwonya, era tewali nsonga egituddisaamu, beppo nga Mukama omulabirizi waffe yaayagadde, Mukama omulabirizi waffe okumanyakwe kubuna buli kintu, ku Katonda kwe twekutte, ayi Mukama omulabirizi waffe salawo wakati waffe nâ€™abantu baffe mu mazima, anti ggwe osinga abasalawo bonna
